info.title: Capability Statement eCR
info.description: This resource defines the expected capabilities for both client and server participating in eCR exchange.

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

200.description: the capbility statement

/Composition/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Composition
/Composition/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Composition

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Composition.description: The Manager for resources of type Composition: provides services to manage the collection of all the Composition instances

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
